settings.minAmountPerTransactionErrorAmountPerDay: Max Amount Per Day must be greater or equal than Min Amount Per Transaction
settings.maxAmountPerTransactionErrorAmountPerDay: Max Amount Per Day must be greater than Max Amount Per Transaction
settings.maxTransactionPerWeekErrorPerDay: Max # of Transactions Per Week must be greater or equal than Max # of Transactions Per Day
settings.maxTransactionPerMonthErrorPerWeek: Max # of Transactions Per Month must be greater or equal than Max # of Transactions Per Week
settings.maxTransactionPerMonthErrorPerDay: Max # of Transactions Per Month must be greater or equal than Max # of Transactions Per Day
settings.amountExceedsAllowedValueError: The entered amount exceeds the allowed value. Maximum value is __value__.
settings.amountBelowAllowedValueError: The entered amount is below the allowed value. Minimum value is __value__.
settings.amountExceedsDailyLimitError: Total entered amounts exceed the daily limit. Maximum value is __value__.
settings.numberTransactionsExceedsDailyLimitError: Total number of transactions per day exceed daily limit. Maximum value is __value__.
settings.numberTransactionsExceedsWeeklyLimitErro: Total number of transactions per day exceed weekly limit. Maximum value is __value__.
settings.numberTransactionsExceedsMonthLimitError: Total number of transactions per day exceed monthly limit. Maximum value is __value__.
